function RIR_EP05_05()
    -- .起-4【1月第2週】「筆頭騎士・鬼灯リラ」
    SaveData.Title = "筆頭騎士・鬼灯リラ"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[Since it was decided that I would participate in the Princess Election, the days have been a whirlwind.
姫皇選挙への参加が決まってからは怒涛の日々だった。]])

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）、オウガ（通常）、１号（通常）、２号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1115.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Serious "So, just like during the Princess Election with Senior Daria, I want everyone in the boys' division to make posters and videos for Erika."
「ってなワケで、ダリア先輩との姫選挙の時みたいに、男子部のみんなにはエリカのポスターと動画を作ってもらいたいの」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0321.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
Smiling "Miss Erika is really making a bold move again."
「エリカ女史もまた大勝負に出たものだな」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mask Senpai #1】
Excited "The boys' division will lend what little help we can! Although, I hear Senpai #3 is taking a break for a while due to family reasons..."
「男子部も微力ながら協力するぞ！　と言っても、３号が実家の都合でしばらく休むそうでな……」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mask Senpai #2】
Excited "We can't make a video like last time, so this time I shall make a statue of Lady Erika! Therefore, I request to borrow some clothes to see the nude form!"
「前回のような動画は作れないから、今回は拙者がエリカ殿の彫像を作るでござる！　然らばヌードを拝見したく、服を拝借！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1596.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Blushing "Eek!"
「ひっ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_EFFECT(65,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1116.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Serious "W-w-whoa! Who do you think you're touching?!"
「ちょちょちょゴラァ！　誰に触れとんじゃー！」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mask Senpai #2】
Panicked "Gyaaaaaaaahhh!?!?"
「ぎゃああああああああああ！？」]])

    MSG([[Lira-san reacted faster than I did and threw Senpai #2, who was advancing on me, flying away.
リラさんがボクより素早く反応し、ボクに迫った２号先輩を投げ飛ばした。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（驚き）、オウガ（通常）、１号（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[Everyone gathered from the boys' division looked wide-eyed at her lightning-fast reaction.
そのあまりの反応速度に、男子部に集まっていた全員が目を丸くする。]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
【Mask Senpai #1】
Panicked "Senpai #2!? I'm supposed to be the one dishing out physical punishment, you cheater!?"
「２号ー！？　肉体的罰は我の役目だというのにズルいぞキサマー！？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0394.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Surprised "She was even faster than my Berserker Mode!"
「わ、私のバーサーカーモードよりも早かったんです」]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0322.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
Normal "That's rare, Hoozuki. Usually you like to join in on the mischief too."
「珍しいな、鬼灯女史。普段ならオマエも悪ノリするところだと思うが」]])

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1117.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Nervous smile/sweat "R-really? I just can't stand sexual harassment, that's all, you know?"
「そ、そうかなー？　セクハラは許せないってだけだけどー？」]])

    MSG([[Lira-san laughed, trying to brush it off.
笑って誤魔化そうとするリラさん。]])

    MSG([[I understood. She was protecting me so my cross-dressing wouldn't be exposed.
ボクにはわかる。
    　ボクの女装がバレないよう守ってくれたんだよね。]])

    MSG([[But to someone who didn’t know the situation, it might have seemed like an overreaction.
ただ、事情を知らないヒトからすれば、ちょっと過敏な反応に映ったかもしれない。]])

    MSG([[This relationship where only two people knew the truth felt a bit awkward.
二人しか真実を知らないこの関係が、何だかむずがゆかった。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[One morning.
ある日の朝。]])

    MSG([[The whole Erika faction arrived early at school, handing out flyers asking each student to vote for Erika and me.
ボクたちはエリカ派の全員で早くに登校し、登校してくる生徒の皆さん一人一人にボク、エリカへの投票をお願いするチラシを配って回った。]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ione Heiwado】
 "Fwaa~... I'm so sleepy... Do these flyers even work?"
「ふわぁ～……眠たいわぁ……こんなチラシで効果ありますのん？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "Under-the-table work suits us sisters better, you know~"
「裏工作の方が、ウチら姉妹には向いてますわぁ～」]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1118.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Smiling "It's not just the flyers, meeting face-to-face in the morning is important. During my Princess Election, Erica gained votes by doing just that."
「チラシ自体じゃなくて、こうして朝に顔を合わせるの大事なんだよ。アタシとの姫選挙でも、エリカはこうして得票数を稼いでたしね」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1597.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Smiling "That brings back memories. At that time, I was just desperate; I didn't even think about the meaning of handing out flyers."
「懐かしいなぁ。でもあの時はとにかく必死で、チラシを配る意味なんて考えてませんでしたよ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1598.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Nervous smile "Now that you mention it, it might be thanks to those flyers that I smoothly memorized all the students’ faces and names."
「言われてみると、スムーズに全校生徒の顔と名前を憶えられたのは、あのチラシ配りのおかげかもしれませんね」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1119.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Normal "It's the same with street speeches—you have to let people know you. If they don't know you, they won't even consider you as an option."
「街頭演説なんかもそうだけどさ、『知ってもらう』ことは何より大切だよ。知らないヤツは選択のテーブルにも上がらないからね」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1120.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Winking "So come on, Heiwado sisters, let's do our best! <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> If Erika takes the throne, you ‘Knights’ will be able to soak up the sweet rewards to your heart's content."
「だから平和堂姉妹の二人もがんばろうぜっ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　エリカが天下をとれば、『騎士』のアンタたちも甘い汁を啜り放題じゃん」]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0039")
    MSG([[
【Ione Heiwado・Jasuko Heiwado】
 "R-really?"
「せ、せやろか？」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1121.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Smiling "I'm serious. It'll be like an all-you-can-drink bar of sweet rewards."
「マジだって。まるで甘い汁のドリンクバーだよ」]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ione Heiwado】
 "Ah, an all-you-can-drink bar of sweet rewards… such a sweet-sounding phrase…"
「あ、甘い汁のドリンクバー……なんて甘美な響き……」]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
【Jasuko Heiwado】
 "I'll hand out as many flyers or bills as it takes! We'll push our big sis Erika up to Princess!"
「チラシでもお札でも何枚でも配りますえー！　エリカの姐はんを姫皇に押し上げるんやー！」]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑・汗）
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1122.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Nervous smile/sweat "Such simple-minded people. I hope they never betray us."
「単純なヤツら。いつか裏切らないといいけど」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1599.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Nervous smile/sweat "They're pretty loyal to obligations and feelings, so they should be fine. Probably."
「何だかんだ義理人情に厚い二人だから大丈夫ですよ。多分」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[Honestly, I was not confident.
正直、自信はなかった。]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0395.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Serious "Hyuahhhhhhh!!! I'll finish handing out flyers in Berserker Mode!"
「ひゅああああああああああああああ！！！　バーサーカーモードでチラシを配り切るんですー！」]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,200,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,200,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    HIYU_PARTICLE_02(150, -60, 200, 60, 200, 70, 5, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0396.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Serious "By distributing flyers at three times the normal speed, ten times the spin, and ten times the volume of voice! A flyer-distributing power that surpasses Lira-san by 3000!"
「通常の三倍の速度に十倍の回転、更に十倍の声の大きさで配ることで！リラさんを凌駕する三〇〇〇チラシ配りパワーですよー！」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    RESET_HIYU_PARTICLE(150)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）、モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1123.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Normal "Ignore the fool raging over there. Once we finish handing out our share, we'll head back to class. We still have to hold our morning strategy meeting today."
「あそこで暴走してるバカは放っておいて。アタシらは既定の枚数を配り終えたら教室に戻るよー。毎朝の作戦会議を、今日もしないとねー」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[--- On another day in the auditorium.
――また別の日の大講堂。]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[The seats were filled with ‘Himegami faction’ students, and Daria stood on the stage.
席にはずらりと『姫神派』の生徒が並び、壇上にはダリアさんが立っている。]])

    MSG([[Although the students of the ‘Himegami faction’ didn’t know what was about to happen, sensing the tense atmosphere, they were uneasy.
『姫神派』の生徒たちは何が始まるか知らされていないながらも、会場のただならぬ気配を察してか、何だかソワソワしていた。]])

    MSG([[And then that unease became reality.
そしてその動揺は現実のものとなる。]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
Serious "The reason I gathered you today is nothing less. As one of the 'Princesses' of this academy, there is something I must tell everyone."
「今日キミたちに集まってもらったのは他でもない。今日はこの学園の『姫』の一人として、みんなに言わなければならないことがある」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
Serious "I have decided to support Erika-kun instead of Hermes in the next Princess Election. In other words, I have chosen to become Erika-kun’s ‘Knight’ rather than Hermes’s."
「私は次の姫皇選挙で、エルメスではなくエリカくんを支持することにした。つまり、エルメスではなく、エリカくんの『騎士』となることを選んだんだ」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
Serious "It may be a tough decision... but if you will, fight alongside Erika-kun and me against the 'Coed faction'."
「ツラい決断になるかもしれないが……もしよければ、エリカくんや私と共に『共学派』と戦ってくれ」]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[The formal declaration of switching to the Erika faction.
エリカ派に転じることの正式な宣言。]])

    MSG([[Although she had subtly hinted at it in recent days, this was the first time she made it explicit. Naturally, the auditorium erupted into chaos.
ここ数日の行動でそれとなく匂わせていたみたいだけど、明言するのは初。 当然、会場内は大騒ぎとなった。]])

    STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-short-hair_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Short-haired 3rd year】
 "P-please take that back! I don’t want to see Lady Daria oppose Lady Hermes!"
「ととと、取り消してください！　エルメスさまと対立するダリアさまなんて観たくありませんー！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-semilong_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Semi-long-haired 3rd year】
 "Exactly! The Himegami sisters are the most precious couple in this world!"
「そうですわ！　姫神姉妹のお二人こそこの世界で最も尊いカップル！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("3rd-longhair_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Long-haired 3rd year】
 "I support Eldari. I have an Eridari trigger."
「エルダリ推しです。エリダリ地雷です」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[It seemed that the ‘Knights’ were especially worried about a clash between Hermes and Daria.
どうやら『騎士』の皆さんが特に心配するのは、エルメスさんとダリアさんが対立すること。]])

    MSG([[Those who supported the ‘Himegami sisters’ could not accept the idea of conflict between them.
『姫神姉妹』として推していた方々には、どうしても姉妹間で争うということを受け入れられないんだ。]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（苦笑・汗）、リラ（驚き）、ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[We from the Erika faction, watching from the entrance of the auditorium, could not hide our surprise at the turmoil exceeding our expectations.
大講堂の入り口のそばから事態を見守っていたボクたちエリカ派も、想像以上の荒れ具合に動揺を隠せなかった。]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0397.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
Panicked "Hyuahhh... this is such a huge mess..."
「ひゅああああ……た、大変な騒ぎなんですぅ……」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1600.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
Serious "Sh-should I step forward and explain?"
「わ、私が前に出て説明した方がよろしいでしょうか」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0446.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
Nervous smile/sweat "Unfortunately, even if Erika steps out now, she would only be heckled by those who are not convinced."
「残念ですが、今エリカさんが出ていっても、納得がいかない皆さんに吊し上げられるだけだと思いますわ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1124.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Nervous smile/sweat "Uran-senpai is right. Well then, leave this operation to me, the one who suggested it."
「ウラン先輩の言う通り。まぁここは、この作戦の言い出しっぺのアタシにまかせてよ」]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン（苦笑・汗）、ヒユ（焦り）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
